msg.msgText: Name Name of the destination mapping rule object QueueManagerConnection Comma delimited list of queue manager connection objects RuleType The mapping rule type Options:1-14 Source The source of the message Destination The destination of the message MaxMessages Maximum message count that can be buffered on the destination Default:5000 Enabled Specify state of the rule. Options:True,False Default:True RetainedMessages Specify which messages are forwarded to a topic as retained messages. Options:None,All Default:None

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
